title: vandanai sheidiDuvEn
sahitya:
(rAgA:  sAramati)   
  vandanai sheidiDuvEn raghunandanA santatam un aravinda malariNai


anupallavi



caraNam 1    gandham kamazhndiDum porul pala kUTTi karuNAnidhi unaik-kanindu nIrATTi
  kaLabha tuLabhamuDan aNi pala pUTTi kaNNArak-kaNDu kanindu mei shilirttiDa
    caraNam 2  			(rAga:  behAg)Aa:S G3 M1 P N3 D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  malli mullai rOjA maNam kamazh sheNpakam malar pala eDuttu mAlaiyAit-toDuttu
 shollinai ishaiyuDan iNaittup-pAmAlaiyum tolvinai aghaTrum un tALmalar shUTTi
    caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  sindhubhairavi)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 G2 P D1 N2 S  Av:  N2 D1 P M1 G2 R1 S N2 S  pAlum kaniyuDan aruvaghai uNDiyum parivuDan nidamumun pashiyAra aLittu
 jnAlam tanil nAn vAzhttiDum nALellAm shIlanE unniru sEvaDi bhatiyAi
